com.receiver2d.engine.io

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.receiver2d.engine.io.FileManager

  • public class FileManager
extends Object
    Useful for dynamically loading various types of data from Receiver2D-specific files.

    • Method Detail

      • loadWorld

        public static World loadWorld(String location)
                       throws ParserConfigurationException,
                              SAXException,
                              IOException,
                              IllegalArgumentException,
                              IllegalAccessException,
                              DOMException
        Parses a Receiver2D World File (.r2dw) into a World. To load this new world into the engine, Receiver2D.loadWorld() must be called.
        Parameters:
        location - The directory-based location of the world.
        Returns:
        A world parsed by XML handling.
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException
        IOException
        SAXException
        DOMException
        IllegalAccessException
        IllegalArgumentException

      • loadResourceFromNode

        public static Object loadResourceFromNode(Node node,
                                          String oType,
                                          String... toIgnore)
                                   throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                          IllegalAccessException
        Extracts information from a given node and converts it into a resource.
        Parameters:
        node - The node (an XML element node) to analyze.
        oType - The type of object to extract information from.
        toIgnore - The names of any attributes to ignore (these will not be treated as fields when using reflection).
        Returns:
        An object whose fields are loaded from information in the node.
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException
        IllegalArgumentException
